mapper.select: /* UrlInfoMapper.selectUrlList */ SELECT RID AS rid, ORIGIN_URL AS originUrl, SHORT_URL AS shortUrl, URL_CALL_NUM AS urlCallNum FROM URL_INFO
/* UrlInfoMapper.selectUrlExist */ SELECT RID AS rid, ORIGIN_URL AS originUrl, SHORT_URL AS shortUrl, URL_CALL_NUM AS urlCallNum FROM URL_INFO WHERE ORIGIN_URL = #{originUrl}
mapper.insert: /* UrlInfoMapper.insertUrl */ INSERT INTO URL_INFO ( RID, ORIGIN_URL, URL_CALL_NUM ) VALUES ( ( SELECT IFNULL(MAX(RID)+1, 10000000) FROM URL_INFO UI ), #{originUrl}, '1' )
